transArray.content: Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West 4th Ring Road, only a five-minute walk from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. , the surrounding transportation network extends in all directions. It's great to see the positive endorsement from you. We will continue our efforts to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay experience. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
